title: When Given a Menu of Tipping Options, People Tip More
sub_head: A study of New York cabdrivers also suggests that when you increase the possible tip amounts, overall tips may go up
body:
Does giving consumers a menu of tipping options make them tip more?
A working paper that looked at millions of rides from New York City Yellow taxi cabs from 2010 to 2018 found that the menu did result in higher tipsâ€”up to a point.
